items.title: Version 6.5+
items.content: This new version brings couple of new modules: Cookies and Google Translation. Head over Modules tab to check them out and install with 1 click.

items.title: Version 6.4.5
items.content: Some features (modal/offcanvas/toast) have been refactored to WP Interactivity API. More info here.

items.title: Special thanks to:
items.content: Translation contributors: Dan Caragea, Vlad T, Peter Smits, Olivier Van Eester, Pieterjan Deneys.
